name: Pastoor Jurg Sondag 20 April
chorusText:
There’s a gladness in my soul todaypraise the Lord, praise the Lordfor my many sins are washed awayHalleluJaH, praise the LordI’ll go singing on my wayfor my night has turned to dayand forever by His side I’ll stayHalleluJaH, Praise the Lord
Oh! What a change (X2)Oh! What a change in my life Oh! What a change (X2)Oh! What a change in my lifeIv’e got Jesus on the insidemoving on the outsidebringing about a change in my life	 X2
This old world can never hold meAny moment I’ll be goneFor I’ve made my consecration And I have my wedding garments on
Yesterday, today and foreverJesus is the sameAll may change but Jesus neverGlory to His Name Glory to His Name, Glory to His Name All may change but Jesus neverGlory to His Name.
Majesty CMajesty, worship His Majestyunto Jesus be glory honour and praiseMajesty, Kingdom Authorityflows from His throne unto His ownHis anthems raiseso exalt, lift up on highthe name of Jesusmagnify, come glorifyChrist Jesus the KingMajesty, worship His MajestyJesus who died, now glorifiedKing of all kings
NOBODY LIKE THEE, LORD, NOBODY LIKE THEEDO KEEP ME HUMBLE, DO KEEP ME TRUEALL THROUGH LIFE's JOURNEY, He’ll CARRY ME THROUGHNOBODY LIKE THEE, LORD, NOBODY LIKE THEE
Niemandsoos Jesus, niemandsoosHy
Hyhou my nedrig, Hyhou my trou
Hy is die Vader, Hy is die Seun
Niemandsoos Jesus, niemandsoosHy
Die oorwinningslied.
Eksien in my gees die glorie
en die almag van die Heer
die Allerhoogstewat in liefde
oorSykoninkrykregeer
Hy’tbeloweaan die einde
op die wolkekomHyweer
Hy is Koning, Hyregeer
Koor: LoofHom, prysHom. HalleluJaH     x3
Hy is Koning, Hyregeer
Die Here is ons vestingwatviraltydsalblystaanHybeskermelkemenswat in geloofnaHom toe gaanHy’sonsSkuilingHy’sonsWapenHy’t die vyand reeds verslaanHy’s die Rots watewigstaanKoor: LoofHom, prysHom, HalleluJaH   x3Hy’s die Rots watewigstaan
Komdeelnou in onslofliedHefjouhande op naboBlaasbasuineslaan op trommeEn komdansvoor God se oёKomleef in die oorwinningVan SyWoordwaarinonsgloWant SyWoordsalewigstaanKoor: LoofHom, prysHom, halleluJaH    x3Want SyWoordsalewigstaan
